text: The Greater Dallas Open was a golf tournament on the Web.com Tour. It was played in June 2015 at The Lakes at Castle Hills in Lewisville, Texas, a city in the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable style=font- size:95% !Year!!Winner!!Country!!Score!!To par!!Margin of victory!!Runners-up |- | 2015 || Tyler Aldridge || || align=center|265 || align=center|−23 || 2 strokes || Lucas Lee Greg Yates |} Bolded golfers graduated to the PGA Tour via the Web.com Tour regular-season money list. ==References== ==External links== *Coverage on the Web.com Tour's official site Category:Former Korn Ferry Tour events Category:Golf in Texas Category:Sports in the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex
title: Greater Dallas Open
